item.title: [BHS/GRA][Data & Analytics] - Logs Data Platform maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 17, 12:00 - 16:00 UTC

Jul 15, 20:38 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our Logs Data Platform offering.

Start time : 17/09/2025 12:00 UTC
End time : 17/09/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : The public API of Logs Data Platform product will be on read only mode during the whole maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on Logs Data Platform offering.
For more information about IAM for Logs Data Platform, you can visit this documentation: KB0071667

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [GRA1][Containers & Orchestration] - Workflow Management service maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 9, 18:00 - 19:00 UTC

Sep 3, 20:21 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Workflow Management service, Mistral.

Here are the details of the maintenance:
Start time : 09/09/2025 18:00 UTC
End time : 09/09/2025 19:00 UTC
Service impact : During this maintenance window for the Workflow Management service (Mistral), you may encounter the following impacts :

- Workflows in progress at the start of the maintenance will be stopped and will be restarted automatically after the maintenance is completed. We understand that this may cause a temporary disruption in your workflow processing, and we apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
- Cron triggers (scheduled workflow executions) during the maintenance period will not be triggered. If you have any workflows scheduled to run during the maintenance window, we recommend rescheduling them to run outside of this timeframe to avoid any disruption.

Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be performing a maintenance on the Mistral service infrastructure. This maintenance is necessary to ensure the continued reliability and performance of our platform.

If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to our support team.

End time : 04/09/2025 07:03 UTC

Sep 4, 07:01 UTC

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 04/09/2025 06:30 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some instances in the Gra1/5/7/9/11 regions are unreachable.
Customers Impact : Some customers cannot acces their instances in these specific regions
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Sep 4, 06:54 UTC

Our teams are fully committed to investigating this issue and working towards a resolution as soon as possible. As investigations are ongoing, we will share any new findings or updates with you as soon as possible.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

item.title: [GRA][Public Cloud] - Keystone API incident notification
item.description:
Sep 3, 15:16 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Keystone API for authentication offer has been resolved.

Start time : 02/09/2025 18:25 UTC
End time : 02/09/2025 20:23 UTC

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Sep 2, 20:58 UTC
Monitoring - Service has been fully restored since 02/09/2025 20:23 UTC. Monitoring remains active to ensure long-term stability.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Sep 2, 18:46 UTC
Identified - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s).

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : Fix implemented resolved the issue and the situation is gradually returning to normal.
Ongoing Actions : Services are being restored gradually.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

Sep 2, 18:25 UTC
Monitoring - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s).

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : Our team has implemented a fix, and all services are operational again.
Ongoing Actions : We keep this under monitoring.

We will keep you updated on the progress.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Sep 2, 17:06 UTC
Update - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s).

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : Our team is still working on a fix and the situation is gradually returning to normal.
Ongoing Actions : Investigations are still in progress and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Sep 2, 16:08 UTC
Update - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s).

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : Following an investigation, it was found that this incident is also affecting object storage, where customers encounter 403 'Signature Does Not match' errors on the object storage offer in the specified region
Ongoing Actions : The team is working on a workaround to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Sep 2, 16:04 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating an incident affecting our Public cloud offering, which is causing temporary functionality issues on validation token in GRA region.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 02/09/2025 15:36 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : The validation token fails on Keystone API.
Customers Impact : Customers using the Keystone API for authentication are currently experiencing temporary issues with validation tokens.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident to fix it.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

item.title: [SBG/DE/RBX/EU-WEST-PAR/UK][Identity, Security & Operations] - Secret Management Service
item.description:
Sep 3, 12:49 UTC

Sep 3, 12:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Aug 27, 19:20 UTC
Scheduled - We want to inform you about an upcoming maintenance window for our Secret Management Service.

Here are the details of the maintenance:

Start time : 03/09/2025 12:00 UTC
End time : 03/09/2025 15:00 UTC
Service impact : During this maintenance window, you may encounter the following impacts on SBG, DE, RBX, EU-WEST-PAR, UK, on a short period of time:

You may not be able to perform Administration tasks on Load Balancer service (creation, deletion, etc.)
You may not be able to perform Administration tasks on Encrypted Volumes (creation, deletion, etc.)
Service of already deployed will not be affected, from end-user perspective

Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our Secret Management Service.

If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to our support team.

item.title: [SBG7][Network] - Network maintenance notification
item.description:
Sep 1, 12:46 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Sep 1, 07:02 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Aug 27, 17:43 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our network infrastructure in the public cloud region SBG7.

Start time : 01/09/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 01/09/2025 15:00 UTC
Service impact :The network of all public cloud compute, loadbalancer and routers located in the region SBG7 will observe up to 2 seconds of packet loss.

Packet loss for compute instances and loadbalancers will be only observed once per service anytime between 07:00 UTC and 08:15 UTC.

Packet loss for routers will can be observed once per router anytime between 07:00 UTC and 15:00 UTC.
Service improvement :As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our network infrastructure.

Thank you for your understanding.
